channel.title: (PI)trade fix ?(PI)
channel.description:
ok i have got all skills working in my server and coded soo much stuff only to find when my friend logged in to help me we cannot trade.... -firstly "accept trade request" doesnt do anything when you click it .... -secondly once you are in trade by trading back "accept" doesnt work..
anyone got any ideas or links to tuts?
Note- dont say *google* i have tried that thats why i have resorted to this flame ridden help site and also if you dont know or havent got anything useful to say dont comment... okaithxbyee

okaithxbyee[/quote]

well… if your friend is admin he cant trade…
Try to demote him and try again cuz when admins trade on some sources its stays “Admins Cant Trade”
